directions.step:
Snap off tender tips of asparagus & discard the rest. Stems will naturally break where tender part begins. Cut tips diagonally into pieces about 2-1/2 in. long. Boil tips in large saucepan 2-3 min. Drain,rinse in cold water & drain again. Sprinkle w/ salt, sugar, soy sauce & sesame oil. Stir to blend seasonings. Refrigerate in covered container. When chilled, taste again & adjust seasoning if necessary. Serve cold.
CHINA ROW
CANNERY ROW; MONTEREY
WINE:MONDAV NAPA GAMAY
From the <Micro Cookbook Collection of Chinese Recipes>. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
